title: The Explara Ticketing Platform
name: Ayushi M.
pros:
Pros: We started using Explara as a ticketing platform for our events in May 2018.

We integrated it in our website and since then have been using it daily.

As we are an events company, we needed a software that could easily help us manage our event ticketing and explara has been a good choice.

When we started events in Singapore last year, we were not sure how to go about with the ticketing.

But with the Explara team's support and guidance, we were able to manage that smoothly.
cons:
Cons: There are many good things about this software. But certain things need a little improvement.

1. The payout invoices we receive need to be more detailed. Since we are only 2 people managing all the events, it gets difficult to visit the dashboard each time to check the payout for each event.

If along with payout structure that we receive, we would get information about what event tickets we have received a payout for, it will be very helpful.

2. The formatting of the event description can be made better.

title: Best DIY ticketing Software
name: Prakhar D.
pros: Pros: The best part which we liked about them is the promptness in their customer support and willingness to improve/customise the platform as per customer's demand which really helped us to make our operations smooth
cons: Cons: I would say to build more on your event manager app to make on-site check-ins, goodies distribution easy which is not good at all as of now. I would also recommend Explara to start e-certificate services.

title: The Review that matters
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: User friendliness, secure payment process features and the team!
overall: Overall: Go to place for all membership management needs and online event management. Great user friendly product and the payments management process is on point!

title: Customer Satisfaction
name: SENGUTTUVAN C.
pros: Pros: User friendly. Easy to customise based on your needs.
cons: Cons: Confusion on International payments and its gateways.

title: Explara for a social venture (startup)
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: When I started using it in 2016 - It was a very personal experience since someone from the explara team was readily available to help with its features. I had his number saved on my phone and was easy to reach. However I do appreciate the later customer management system.
cons: Cons: Varying service charge rates over the years. I was not in control/wasnt made aware of these changes.
overall: Overall: Explara has been quite useful and has provided my past venture with a great accessible platform.

title: Explara Review
name: Vidya B.
pros: Pros: this is very handy, well designed, customer support is very good, it is very helpful in spreading the business
cons: Cons: I have an overall good experience, nothing really is bad about it.
overall: Overall: Explara has been quite useful and has provided my past venture with a great accessible platform.

title: A very comprehensive platform
name: Deepika P.
pros: Pros: Easy to use and the team provides great service
cons: Cons: Provide a little more flexibility for the event
overall: Overall: Creating an event management for attendees

title: Ease of Usage
name: Upasana Mahtani L.
pros: Pros: Explara is an extremely easy to use and efficient portal. For someone who is very resistant to technology I find it a breeze.Also the entire team is extremely supportive and helpful with the innumerable questions I always seem to stumble upon.
cons: Cons: Nothing as such.. I get stuck at times . But that is easily solved by their help desk

title: Great platform with user-friendly interface
name: Anmol S.
pros: Pros: The platform's user friendly interface which is super handy to use both by organizers and ticket buyers alongwith electronic app check-in was a super hit.
cons: Cons: The event setup procedure has some bugs related to updating of pictures and thumbnails for event website.
overall: Overall: Organizing our monthly meetup has been a great experience with Explara's tools and ticketing platform. Now we can do all that without any hassle.

title: Nice UI/UX

pros:
Pros: 1. Better UI and UX

2. Nice Reports. especially the incomplete user

Cons: 1. Can have few more reports and charts like ticket type, ticket type price

2. They need to provide on field support

3. more user friendly ticket scan app

4. More option to ticket generation config

title: ICISS'18
